name: Angry Dino Toons
description:
The cavemen are taking over your territory! Launch your dino into the rocks to drive them out! Choose from a T-Rex, Triceratops and other dinos. Avoid geysers, volcanos, and spears, rocks and other objects thrown by the cavemen.

Features the latest in high end rendering, animation and physically based interactions. The gameplay and camera management is finely tuned to achieve the maximum immersive experience!

Rock formations from central Colorado, Utah, and the Grand Canyon provided the inspiration for the level design, 20 different zones in all.
